typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		customer_Id as integer,
		DOB as string,
		Gender as string,
		city_code as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Created_Modified_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 4) ~> inputcustomer
inputcustomer derive(DOB = toDate(DOB,'dd-MM-yyyy'),
		Created_Modified_Date = toTimestamp(Created_Modified_Date,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm')) ~> datatypechange
datatypechange alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		customer_Id as integer,
		DOB as date,
		Gender as string,
		city_code as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		active_flag as string,
		efective_start_date as timestamp,
		efective_end_date as timestamp,
		last_updated_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['customer_Id'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		customer_Id,
		DOB,
		Gender,
		city_code,
		Customer_Name,
		last_updated_date = Created_Modified_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Dcustomer
